Our platform enables fast, secure, and a: Our platform enables fast, secure, and anonymous cryptocurrency payments with a low transaction fee of just 0.4%. Select your preferred fiat currency, specify the amount, and choose from a variety of supported blockchains and cryptocurrencies to receive payments directly to your wallet.
With no intermediaries, your funds move: With no intermediaries, your funds move seamlessly from crypto to crypto. The process is designed for simplicity, ensuring you can create payment requests in minutes while maintaining full control over your transactions.
For Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM)-compa: For Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM)-compatible chains, you only need to provide a single wallet address. This address will be used for all EVM-compatible networks, ensuring a streamlined experience.
Quickly create a simple crypto payment r: Quickly create a simple crypto payment request anyone can pay — no account needed.
Prepare payments on our platform for var: Prepare payments on our platform for various products, then embed payment buttons or links on your website.
Seamless integration with major webshop: Seamless integration with major webshop platforms like WooCommerce and Shopify, for smooth crypto payments.
We are pioneering the next generation of: We are pioneering the next generation of cryptocurrency payment solutions, designed with simplicity, security, and scalability in mind. Our mission is to empower businesses and individuals to accept crypto payments seamlessly, without the hassle of complicated setups or costly intermediaries.
We have successfully launched an anonymo: We have successfully launched an anonymous payment solution — enabling instant, secure transactions with a low fee of only 0.4%. Currently supporting a select range of cryptocurrencies on the Base blockchain, our platform operates without swapping or bridging, ensuring your funds move directly from crypto to crypto every time.
This is just the beginning. Soon, we wil: This is just the beginning. Soon, we will offer account-based features, allowing you to integrate effortlessly with popular platforms like WooCommerce and Shopify. You’ll also gain access to detailed analytics right from your dashboard, helping you track your sales, revenue, and customer behavior — all in one place.
We currently support the following block: We currently support the following blockchains and their cryptocurrencies. Enjoy seamless payments with a low fee of just 0.4% per monocurrency transaction.
